alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area; Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 2:02PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT SOUTHWESTERN DOUGLAS AND SOUTHWESTERN CHELAN COUNTIES... At 159 PM PST, an area of heavy snow was impacting areas from Stevens Pass into the Wenatchee area. The snow will continue to be extremely heavy on Stevens Pass, with snow rates up to 6" per hour. Drivers should be ready for extremely challenging if not impossible driving conditions over Stevens Pass. Locations impacted include... Wenatchee, East Wenatchee, Cashmere, Leavenworth, Rock Island, East Wenatchee Bench, South Wenatchee, West Wenatchee, Stevens Pass, Sunnyslope, Ida Creek Campground, Tumwater Campground, Eightmile Campground, Bridge Creek Campground, Dryden, Eight Mile Campground, Malaga, Rock Island Campground, Chatter Creek Campground, and Monitor. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 2 in Washington between mile markers 65 and 74, and between mile markers 89 and 131. U.S. Highway 97 in Washington between mile markers 177 and 184. Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow. &&

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area; Western Chelan County
